participant_1.background:
I've had to give up a lot of my friends to pursue my dream of filmmaking.
My musical tastes will make me more relatable to my co-workers at the bank.
i love to eat meat.
I play disc golf because it's a good way to get exercise and spend time outdoors with my collie.
I'm worried about how we're going to make ends meet on one income.

participant_2.background:
I have a warm, welcoming smile that makes people want to be my friend.
i love to cut down trees.
sometimes i wish i did not have to wake up in the morning.
I love to tinker with my convertible car and take it for a spin on the weekends.
i work for the discovery channel creating videos.

content.text: I'm glad I met you. You seem so nice.
I'm a filmmaker. I've had to give up a lot of my friends to pursue my dream.
I'm sorry to hear that. What kind of films do you make?
I make documentaries. I want to tell stories that people will care about.
That's great! I work for the discovery channel creating videos. I love my job.
That's awesome! I love watching discovery channel.
Me too! It's one of my favorite channels.
What kind of videos do you make?
I make a variety of videos, but my favorite ones are about science and nature.
That's awesome! I love science and nature.
Me too! We should hang out sometime and talk about our favorite science and nature documentaries.
That would be great! I'd love to hang out with you.
Great! I'll text you my number.
